Posts.Content: Thanks. It is just been crazy year. Now I have to go back to the dr. with something else.
Posts.Title: Burning breast breast bone pain

Posts.Content: Hi I am 32 and breast feeding my 11 month old son. I have been having pain that feels like it is coming from my breast bone. Now I have burning around my breast. Also some pain around my underarm. I had a dermoid cyst and had an ovary removed last year. Also had surgery for hernated disc. I feel like I am going crazy and Hate to go to the dr. because it is always something. But I don't want to be stupid either. I feel like I am going crazy. Thanks for any help.
Posts.Title: Burning breast breast bone pain

Posts.Content: It has been hurting for to long. I have a lot of the pain between my breast.
